Text.Page:
We can't let the mekonari or argons use that temple at the Raven Altar for evil rituals.

Take down the mekonari {@LinkCreature:56#7#templars} and {@LinkCreature:56#8#dedicants}, and {@LinkCreature:56#23#kalash avengers}.

Report to Kalyn at Camp Umbra when your mission is complete.
That the argons want the place is reason enough for us to clear everyone out of it.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
